name: Spillage
description:
You've gotten lost in a mysterious landfill. Explore this puzzling place and uncover mysterious areas. Enjoy your time however you choose, there are lots of things to discover.

"Pixels boy" assets released under the Creative Commons Zero (CC0) license.
